meaningMnemonic: Because the hiragana ends with an う sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>conceal</kanji>, so if you conceal yourself and walk around you are going <vocabulary>to lurk</vocabulary> or you are going <vocabulary>to lie dormant</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: <reading>He so</reading> (ひそ) hidden. Where you at?
